title: [AMA] dcstarwars

replies.body: Where do you live? Favourite Food? Favourite Drink? Favourite Colour? Favourite Animal? Favourite Fruit? Favourite Avicus Map? What's your name in real life? How did you find Avicus?
replies.body_tagged: Where do you live? Favourite Food? Favourite Drink? Favourite Colour? Favourite Animal? Favourite Fruit? Favourite Avicus Map? What's your name in real life? How did you find Avicus?

replies.body:
So first we have DCRaven and then we have dcstarwars xD.

How did you find out about the server?
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Remember you from OCN and AVNK, what's up

replies.body: Oi I know you from OCN. Welcome to the server and enjoy your stay
replies.body_tagged: Oi I know you from OCN. Welcome to the server and enjoy your stay

replies.body:
hi everyone :)

@dafrozenblade i live in the states, pasta, strawberry hi-c drink, purple, dog, kiwi, not sure - havent played them all, david, known about it for a while, just decided to start playing more regularly

@poker more of my friends from other servers play here too, so i joined

@vice i dont recognize your username, would you remind me who you are? with all the name changes its so hard to keep track ;-;

@pie hey :P ty
